name: HM_PLAN_INFO
description: This table contains data about a Health Maintenance Plan's record ID and name.

columns.name: HM_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Health Maintenance Plan record.

columns.name: HM_PLAN_ID_HM_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Health Maintenance Plan record.

columns.name: HM_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Health Maintenance Plan record.
